Summary: The disc object desended above the houses there was a flash
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Bristol
There were no other sightings in Bristol on or around June 14th 2011
divs: Sighting Detailsi was in the garden chasing the neighbours cat for having a crap on my lawn when i was blinded by a flash the source was a star like object in the sky i swayed from side to side and desended closer to the house rooftops i noticed a small capsule on top of it.I was scared so grabbed my camera to take a picture but the image was blurred and i raged throwing my camera at the cat smashing it in the process. I bent down to pick up my smashed camera i saw a second flash and the object had gone. Unforuneatly i could not retrieve the picture from its broken memory
